pages.text: $(thing)Melody$() is a magical power released from $(l:instruments)Music Instruments$(/l) that have been played.$(br2)Each Instrument has a $(thing)Melody Threshold$(), meaning that only a certain amount of Melody can be released from one Instrument for a specific $(l:ceremonies)Ceremony$(/l) or other effect. $(1)White smoke$() indicates that the Threshold for a particular Instrument has been reached.

Usually, it is necessary to play $(1)several different Instruments$() to get the desired effect. If you are having trouble creating enough Melody, try looking if there is another Instrument that you have not used yet.
